name: You Are g00p
description:
This is a game about g00p. The universes caretaker for spacetime. 

You need to move orbs onto platforms while navigating the many perils of your poorly linked together work environment.  

(if you get stuck on the infinite corridor, walk away from the arrow twice)

A and D to move and whatnot

Music is from z3r0 on youtube, made for the GMTK gamejam on the 13th of june, 2021
